summary: This two-part science fiction docu-drama examines the possibilities of a dangerous, manned space mission to explore the inner and outer planets of the Solar system.
cast: David Suchet|Martin McDougall|Joanne McQuinn|Rad Lazar|Mark Dexter|Michelle Joseph|Mark Tandy|Hélène Mahieu|Lourdes Faberes|John Schwab|Colin Stinton|Rodolfo Jiménez|Maurice Nathan Weert
keywords: reenactment|solar system|tv mini series|near future|21st century
title: Odisea en el espacio
